1.title: Jurassic Jerk/Assistant Chief McFibber
1.plot: Claw wants a T-Rex egg from Cretaceous Ranch to clone a dinosaurs army and recreate scenes from "Revengeasaurus Rex: the Stompening". / Talon captures Chief Quimby in a giant hat trap, then takes over HQ by posing as 'Assistant Chief McFibber'.

2.title: Drone of Silence/Growing Like MAD
2.plot: MAD is using Drones of Silence to mute all the opera singers around the world. Only one remains, Australian diva Shelia Chanson. And Inspector Gadget is tasked to protect her. / MAD botanists have developed a plant mutagen that turns any plant deadly with just a few drops. Talon turns Penny's prize pepper plant into a giant destructive monster.

3.title: MAD Money/Baking Bad
3.plot: Penny's forced to fight crime the old-fashioned way when Gadget's blunders put HQ in the poorhouse; Talon sneaks into HQ dressed as a Sweetie Scout.

4.title: Tempest in a Tea Cup/Mr. Security
4.plot: Gadget's sent to keep the peace between two nations on the brink of war; Talon tries to steal Mr. Security, HQ's new super-intelligent computer system.

5.title: Cooking with Claw/Catnipped in the Bud
5.plot: Gadget cooks up a plan to catch culinary kidnappers; With the future of the planet at stake, Penny and Talon form a reluctant partnership.

6.title: Cuckoo for Talon/Fayre Game
6.plot: MAD taps the Cuckoo Clock-maker for an earsplitting scheme; Penny and Talon enter a medieval tournament to win their way back to the 21st century.

7.title: Picnic Pests/Talent Show Off
7.plot: Talon's sent to plant a bug at HQ's annual company picnic; Dr. Claw tries to rig a citywide talent show so he'll get to be mayor for the day.

8.title: Gadget & Oatsfunkle/Metro City's Sinking
8.plot: Talon turns up the funk to play Gadget's long-lost singing partner; An underground maze of tunnels puts Metro City on the brink of collapse.

9.title: The Lady and the Vamp/The Walking Head Cold
9.plot: Gadget goes to Transylvania to stop MAD from stealing the secret to immortality; Dr. Claw concocts a cold-like virus to turn HQ's agents into zombies.

10.title: Get Smarts/Escape Room with a View
10.plot: MAD sends Talon to a meeting of the minds to drain brainpower from the world's best thinkers; A gloating rival prompts Dr. Claw to get competitive.

11.title: Who Do Voodoo/Midnight MADness
11.plot: Baron Von Steeltoe baits Dr. Claw into stealing an ancient voodoo relic; MAD harnesses the power of the moon to drive Metro City's citizens crazy.

12.title: Gadg-ED/See You Later, Super Gator
12.plot: A mustachioed Talon throws a wrench in Gadget's re-certification process; Dr. Claw breeds an army of artificially intelligent alligators.

13.title: Rain of Terror/The Truth Is Under There
13.plot: Dr. Claw and Talon cause mayhem with their weather "disrupticator"; MAD plots to steal alien tech from a fallen spacecraft.

14.title: Frienemy of the State/MADhenge
14.plot: Malicious becomes Claw's No 2 after Talon is captured by a HQ agent other than Penny. / All the energies of the cosmos are about to be concentrated at Stonehenge. Trying to collect it, Talon and Penny receive cosmic powers.

15.title: The Claw Who Stole Christmas/The Thingy
15.plot: Christmas is about to be ruined by heart-freezing nano bots dropped by Talon from Dr. Claw's Sleigh. / A new biological organism, or 'Thingy', has been dug up at the North Pole. Dr. Claw wants to unleash it upon the world.

16.title: The Talon-ted Mr. Colin/MADzilla
16.plot: Disguised as HQ's new intern Colin, Talon intends to learn the missile defense codes from blabbermouth Kayla. / MAD cat becomes a giant kitty when Talon is ordered to steal a Size-Modification ray.

17.title: Anti-gravity/Too Many Talons
17.plot: Claw wants to reverse Metro City's gravity by ordering Talon to steal a Gravity-Reversivier. / MAD Henchman #2 is chosen to be duplicated into a MAD army but first Talon has to steal the Twin City science labs duplicating device.

18.title: Star Power/Panda-monium
18.plot: Gadget has to guard his idol Tag Shrapnel from getting his star powered sweat stolen by MAD and Brain becomes Tag's co-star, 'Bark Ruffalo'. / Bling-Bling the social media panda is the only hope in the peace talks between North and South Guatamazille. So Dr. Claw forces Talon to take Bling-Bling's place.

19.title: Under the MADnight Sun/Skyrates Off the Starboard Bow!
19.plot: Claw needs Magstenium ore to build Claw's Cave Condo Kingdominion underground. Gadget, Penny and Brain happen to be camping in the Yukon near a huge deposit of this rare ore. / Sir Owen Barnstormer's Ultrablimp mark II's maiden voyage is in danger of a MAD pirate attack.

20.title: Fate it til You Make it/Once Upon a Screentime
20.plot: Obsessed with watching "Uptown Tabby", Dr. Claw orders Talon to kidnap the Oracle of Delphi so he can learn future story lines. Meanwhile, Inspector Gadget puts all his faith in fortune cookies. / MAD's Hypno-GIF virus has stopped nearly everybody in his or her tracks. Penny's eyes are already out of wack because of spending too much hours staring at her Codex.

21.title: The MADstache of Professor Coin/MADthuselah
21.plot: Talon infiltrated HQ to destroy it's core reactor. He uses a Perma-Disguisinator to disguise himself as Penny and gives the real Penny the appearance of 'MAD Professor Coin'. / Dr. Claw's birthday is coming up, so he orders Talon to use a MADthuselah machine make all of Metro City's citizen's older than him.

22.title: The Heir Affhair/Parched Nemesis
22.plot: Gadget, Penny and Brain find themselves in one of MAD's top secret lairs trying to stop Talon from becoming the heir to hair care tycoon Ms. Harriet Bouffantington. / MAD has drained all of Metro City's water. Dr. Claw wants to use it to grow a giant Jack O'Lantern but Talon decides to force the thirsty citizens to join MAD in exchange for H2O.

23.title: Trees Company/MADtrack
23.plot: Weed Wacko has been rehabilitated and now he loves plants. Gadget helps him make a garden, but Wacko plans to turn people into trees. / Jacques Crankcase and his henchmen have been captured and are being transported to jail on the Laser Express. Claw needs a chauffeur to attend an Award show, so Talon has to break Jacques out.

24.title: The Missionball Ball/Tell Me What Sphinx
24.plot: At the annual HQ Missionball Ball, Talon is playing DJ to make the agents dance uncontrollably using Claws's new Puppet Pulser. / Claw wants the power to turn people to stone from The Great Sphinx of Giza. But first all of it's riddles need to be solved.

25.title: Harmageddon/Do No Arm
25.plot: Comet Old Salty is passing over Metro City and Claw wants all it's wish-granting power for himself. Soon, Gadget thinks he and Brain are the last to survivors on Earth. / Penny hurts her arm. Unfortunately, Talon is playing doctor and using special bandages to control his patients.

26.title: Inspector Gadget Goes to Jail/We Had a Really Good Title for This One... But We Forgot It
26.plot: Inspector Gadget goes to jail for committing the worst crime of all: shoplifting. But he think's he's undercover and Penny is certain he was framed. / Cuckoo Clockmaker has implanted a device in Inspector Gadget that resets his internal clock. This causes Gadget to forget all about the last hour, just when he's preparing a dinner for Chief Quimby.

1.title: Gadget 2.0
1.plot: Inspector Gadget is called out of retirement when Dr. Claw is defrosted in the Antarctic. Claw needs to find his claw, lost during his last battle with Gadget, so he can finally unleash his stink bomb and destroy Chief Quimby's H.Q.

2.title: Towering Towers/Game Over, Man
2.plot: MAD breaks into Towering Towers, the words largest skyscraper currently under construction, to hack into the Global Satelllite Communications Array and all of Earth's satellites. Gadget, Penny, Brain and a wild bull are on the case. / When several astronauts disappear on the Multi-National Space Station, Inspector Gadget is convinced that aliens are behind it, but Penny is not so sure. They take Professor Von Slickstein's new "This Isn't Your Father's Rocketship" Rocketship up there to investigate.

3.title: Rock Out/Strike a Pose
3.plot: Talon plans to impersonate international pop star Nigel St. De La Peppertone IV Esquire III and turn his entire audience (including Penny) into a 'teen army' for Dr. Claw. He uses a mind control device shaped like a microphone. Gadget is to guard the pop star and tries to get him interested in his old Jazz & Opera group demo. / Professor Von Slickstein is feeling nervous having to present his latest top secret invention at the Paris Gizmo Garp Tech Show. MAD's fashion agent Corsetta Camisole is also attending, intend to get her hands on Von Slickstein.

4.title: A Better Class of MAD/Cough Due to Claw
4.plot: MAD kidnaps action movie star Tag Shrapnel at Isla Diabolical resort to shoot a new recruitment video. Inspector Gadget is convinced the fabled Slobsquatch is behind Shrapnel's disappearance. / Someone has been stealing priceless artifacts from various museums for MAD. Agent in training Penny gets her first solo assignment since her Uncle Gadget has the flu.

5.title: Dog Show Days Are Over/One Bad Apple
5.plot: Inspector Gadget poses as a judge at the Ultimate Grand Supreme Championship Dog and Pony Show after Dr. Claw trains MAD cat to infiltrate the show and hypnotize the contestants, one of which is Brain. / Penny is underwhelmed at being assigned to investigate an apple orchard, not realizing MAD scientists have created an evil mutant apple army to unleash on the world.

6.title: Sucks Like MAD/A Claw for Talon
6.plot: Claw wants Talon to steal the most powerful vacuum cleaner ever made, the Golden Suckatron 9000 a the International Vacuum Cleaning Convention, so he can clean his evil lair. / Talon decides to seek out his uncle's training Claw at Claw Mannor. Inspector Gadget, Penny and Brain are sent to the manor as well, despite Gadget's fear of ghosts.

7.title: Gadget's Da Bomb/Gadget Management
7.plot: Inspector Gadget becomes a walking time bomb after eating a pizza that was specially prepared by MAD and then swapped by Talon. / Tasked to infiltrate this years MAD employee conference, Gadget walks into an anger management class, Penny works on her disguise skills and Brain uncovers a Henchpet training hosted by MAD cat.

8.title: Diamonds Are a MAD's Best Friend/Ticked Off
8.plot: Gadget, Penny & Brain join MADtana Dan in his search for the Lost City of Diamonds. Dr. Claw wants the diamonds for his laser, so he can carve his name into the moon, causing global weather disasters. / The Cuckoo Clockmaker has invented a way to freeze time. Claw intends to freeze everyone attending the Really Important Meeting of Really Important World Leaders in St. Moritz, Switzerland. But only so he can add them to his snow globe collection.

9.title: You Know the Drill/Operation HQ Reunion
9.plot: While investigating the MAD hyper drill in the small town of Friendsburg, Inspector Gadget is surprised to run into the first annual Inspector Gadget Day. / Penny is excited to meet her hero Detective Data at the Top Agent HQ reunion. Being an Agent in Training, she and Brain serve as the serving staff.

10.title: A Hole in One/Operation Hocus Pocus
10.plot: Mama Claw intends to put every single person in Metro City into a deep sleep by getting them addicted to her delicious MAD donuts / Gadget's old college roommate and former magic act partner, the MADgician, plots his revenge on the Inspector after being broken out of his asylum by MAD.

11.title: MAD Carpet Ride/Appy Days
11.plot: Claw orders Talon to steal Sir Owen Barnstormer's new Ultra Blimp / MAD takes over gaming company SuperNerd Studios and has launched the super addictive app game "MADcatter".

12.title: Collider Scope/She Got Dangerous Game
12.plot: Talon has taken over the Big Quark Collider's time travel device and lures Penny & Gadget into his time loop trap. / Chief Quimby sends Gadget on a vacation disguised as a mission. Claw hires MADison Bon Trapp to capture Gadget so he can post pictures of himself and his captured nemesis on MySpyPlace.com

13.title: My Gadget Will Go On/The Gadgetator
13.plot: MAD cat sinks Dr. Claw's new Luxury Submarine, the Loathe Boat, and Talon has to retrieve it from the bottom of the ocean. Chief Quimby tasks Gadget, Penny & Brain to get the sub first. / MAD is after El Pecho's championship belt, constructed of Obscurium (the shiniest metal on Earth). Claw intents to install it on his reflecting dish and use it to light up the moon permanently.

14.title: Head Case/Start Your Gadgets
14.plot: MADtana Dan has located an ancient artifact on Easter Island connected to the island's mysterious headstone. Gadget is certain it has something to do with the Easter Bunny. / Dr. Claw wants to win the prestigious La Zoom car race trophy because it's made of a giant, ultra-magnetic rock. MAD agents Jacques Crankcase and Talon compete against Gadget in his Gadgetmobile and Penny on her new scooter.

15.title: Mind Over MADder/Train-ing Day
15.plot: The mythical Helmet of Thought has been located in the Himalayas. Gadget, Penny and Brain have to get it before Talon does. / Sir Owen Barnstormer's new Hover Express has to be moved to H.Q before the vehicle is high jacked by Talon and MAD Cat (disguised as an injured baby coyote).

16.title: Ice Ice Yeti/MAD Soaker
16.plot: Talon has built a giant melting machine and captured a yeti to power it and is about to flood the world so that his uncle can dock his new MAD yacht at his evil lair. / Dr. Claw is mad because he hasn't been invited to Baron Von Steeltoe's annual Super Villain Soirée, unaware that Talon has kept back his invite so he can go there alone.

17.title: The Fountain of Cortez/Evil U
17.plot: Dr. Ithica Marvins finds the fabled Foutain of Corez but is betrayed by Talon. Claw intends to use the fountain to turn the entire world population into babies. Chief Quimby decides to join Gadget, Penny & Brain on this mission, hoping to get rid of some Gray hairs in his mustache. / Dr. Claw's old university, Evil U, is having it's annual Catch a Good Guy Day and this year, Gadget is the good guy. Penny goes undercover as transfer student 'Penny Crime'.

18.title: WereBrain of London/Airhead to the Throne
18.plot: Talon is working on a MAD muscle mix mixture to turn MAD agents into super humans in an underground lab in London. One of his experimental serums accidentally transforms Brain into a werewolf. / MAD shuts down for the weekend while Dr. Claw visits his mother. Talon grabs his chance and starts taking down communication towers with help from his new MAD bird, But this triggers the MAD lair's self destruct mode.

19.title: Lost in the Lost City of Atlantis/A Penny Saved
19.plot: Claw plans to build Clawtonia and turn it into the greatest city in the world, by using the long lost City Sinker from the sunken city of Atlantis to sink all the other great cities on Earth. / Talon has to steal Giganto, the world's largest coin, attach it to the Statue of Liberty's chain and she will hypnotize the entire city to do Dr. Claw's bidding. As luck has it, Gadget, Penny and Brain are already at the modern art exhibit, as the Inspector wants to interest Penny in numismatics (coin collector) like himself.

20.title: Double O'Penny/We Heart Gadget
20.plot: Talon creates an evil clone of Penny and has her infiltrate H.Q. to destroy Inspector Gadget. / It's Valentine's day, and MAD is using the spy dating site Molematcher to extract secrets from agents. Gadget goes on an undercover date as 'Gordy Trenchcoat' with MAD agent Sue Donym.

21.title: Tiny Talon Time/The FellowSHEEP of the Ring
21.plot: Using his new Anti-Matter Shrink Ray, Dr. Claw makes Talon tiny and orders him to infiltrate H.Q. and steal Inspector Gadget's schematics (as well as Professor Von Slickstein 's Soup Tuesday soup recipe) / MAD plans to shut down global technology with a giant technology nullifier on New Zealand's highest peak. Penny feels lost being unable to use her Codex, and Talon longs to use his precious MAD phone again.

22.title: A Clawruption/Forever MAD
22.plot: Dr. Claw plans to trigger a volcanic interruption that will block out the suns rays and render Hawaii a wasteland. Talon has an alternative plan involving pineapple grenades. Inspector Gadget is more interested in discovering volcano dwellers. / For personal reasons, Claw orders Talon to produce a Broadway show to ruin all musicals forever. Gadget and Penny both audition, with him getting the lead and her becoming a chorus girl.

23.title: Beyond Gadgetdome/Brain Drain
23.plot: Doctor Claw is competing against Baron Von Steeltoe to see which one can deface the most world monuments. Penny is preoccupied with studying for her exams and Gadget is obsessed with the 'Angry Arnie' post-apocalyptic movies. / Talon proposes to use the experimental Switcheroo 2000 to swap the brains of Brain and MAD Cat so she can steal H.Q.'s new pass-codes.

24.title: What Is... The MADtrix?/Most Extreme Gadget Challenge
24.plot: Inspector Gadget, Penny and Brain are trapped in the HQ Holo Room by Talon's MADtrix program. / Dr. Claw enters Gadget in a Japanese game show "Extreme Happy Challenge Danger Show" hosted by MAD Cat in a Robo-host body.

25.title: Pyramid Scheme/Back to the MAD Future
25.plot: Dr. Claw orders Talon to sink the Pyramids of Giza because they block the view from his new Egeptian lair. Inspector Gadg is convinced that Mummies were the original MAD agents. / When Dr. Claw is excluded from the Top 50 most evil plots of all time list, he tells Talon to travel back in time and present younger Claw self with the 50 evil plots.

26.title: Tool Russia, with Love/Low Speed
26.plot: The MAD henchmen's uniforms haven't been changed since Dr. Claw first started his evil organization. So, Talon has to fill a volcano with 1000 mega liters of water and turn it into a steam cleaner. Afraid that this might trigger an ice age, HQ decides to team up Inspector Gadget & Penny with their Russian counterparts, Comrate Multi Use Tool and Pasha. / Gadget is driving the tour company bus to the annual HQ retreat. Talon plants a state of the art doomsday device on the bus that seals it's passengers and freezes the entire vehicle in MADtanium if the bus doesn't ...

imdb.plot outline: After being missing for years, Dr. Claw is revived by his nephew, Talon, with designs of conquest once again. In response, HQ calls Inspector Gadget out of retirement to face this menace. Fortunately, his niece, Penny, and his dog, Brain, are also able to help him once again. However, they are now official junior partners who can operate in the open at last, which is all the better considering the Inspector is just as clueless as ever.
imdb.title: Inspector Gadget
plot: When Dr. Claw returns, _Inspector Gadget_ (qv) is brought out of retirement to defeat him again, now with Penny and Brain's open participation.::Kenneth Chisholm

After being missing for years, Dr. Claw is revived by his nephew, Talon, with designs of conquest once again. In response, HQ calls _Inspector Gadget_ (qv) out of retirement to face this menace. Fortunately, his niece, Penny, and his dog, Brain, are also able to help him once again. However, they are now official junior partners who can operate in the open at last, which is all the better considering the Inspector is just as clueless as ever.::Kenneth Chisholm (kchishol@rogers.com)
synopsis: When DR. Claw returns from being frozen in the Antarctic, Inspector Gadget is brought of of retirement to defeat him - again!
